name: Dying Or Not
description:
This escape game is inspired by Pokemon Sun & Moon Episode 3 & 12 & 38 where Meowth almost dies after seeing unclothed Mimikyu. 

In this game, you want to escape from another world and go back to your original world without dying.

Controls: 

  • WSAD to move
  • E to interact if any
  • Mouse to look around
  • ESC to quit

Free assets used:

  • Unity standard assets, Five Seamless Tileable Ground Textures, Cherry Tree, SlimeGirl from Unity asset store
  • Cat sound from kessels.com
  • Sound effects from freesoundeffects.com, soundbible.com, youtube.com
  • Loading screen from Youtuber Unity3d College
  • Emergency exit symbol & Exit sign from wikimedia.org
